author: Carol Manley

review: Works well; not quite as sophisticated as some of the larger boxes.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I own both Google chromecast  and Fire TV stick. I got Fire TV stick for $20 when it is available for preorder. It is a clear winner among these two. I can install any third party application on the device, you can't do that on the chromecast. I have to admit that the streaming is very good and hardly see the buffering issues that I notice with chromecast. A real remote is another added benefit. If I were to choose chromecast or Fire TV I'll pick Fire TV in a heartbeat.
author: Balaji Balasubramaniam "Balaji"

review: Same complaint as others.  Drops wifi signal for no good reason when all my other devices work fine.  Back to my wii for streaming movies etc I suppose.  Have the same problem with prime movies as well though so this may not be a device so much as an Amazon problem.  Sure to lose the crazy small remote all to often as well!!  Bought it to watch prime and it will not even do that.  This thing sucks would not buy knowing what I know now.
author: Rebecca P.

review: It is a great streaming device that is easy to set up and use. And when coupled with  Prime Instant video it is a bargain!
author: Rodney F. Tims "Old Wrench"

review: I love my FireTV and had high hopes for the FireTV Stick. When it works, it's fantastic. But it seems to drop the network connection quite frequently, and the only way to fix it is to power cycle the Stick by unplugging it and plugging it back in. This minor issue can be quite annoying, and happens nearly every day.Because of this, I can't say I recommend it, but I also won't say I don't recommend it, as when it works, it works well. I hope maybe it's a firmware issue that Amazon can somehow issue and update for and fix.
author: Pedram

review: I actually got to the point where I enjoyed the interface on this device, and had 2-3 days of really pleasant viewing experience.Now, my device will no longer connect to my wifi connection. Or it will connect and then say "authentication problem". Not sure why it just up and quit working after a few days. All other devices, including Apple TV, still connect perfectly.I bought this to be able to stream Prime video, so I'm pretty disappointed. Hoping for some sort of technical solution in the near future. Until then, I would NOT recommend purchasing this item.
author: Mary K. Baynor

review: Product does not work. The stick only dfisdplays the amazon logo, then the screen goes blank. I have reset it a million times with the same outcome. I will be returning this product to amazon. Extremely disappointed.
